snippet: The arrest of Kendel Felix followed the investigation into the death of Menachem Stark, the builder whose body was found smoldering in a trash bin on Long Island in January.
abstract: New York Police Department arrests Kendel Felix in connection with death of Brooklyn developer Menachem Stark, who was abducted from his office in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, and found murdered in Nassau County gas station; Felix is charged with second-degree murder.
lead_paragraph: The arrest of Kendel Felix followed the investigation into the death of Menachem Stark, the builder whose body was found smoldering in a trash bin on Long Island in January.

headline.main: Man Charged With Killing a Developer in January
headline.print_headline: Man Charged With Killing a Developer in January
